name: Raymond M. KRUSHIN, Petitioner v. Honorable Judge HUGHES, President Judge, Luzerne County, Respondent

parties: Raymond M. KRUSHIN, Petitioner v. Honorable Judge HUGHES, President Judge, Luzerne County, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of December, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED, and the Protho-notary is DIRECTED to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
127 A.3d 1290
Raymond M. KRUSHIN, Petitioner v. Honorable Judge HUGHES, President Judge, Luzerne County, Respondent.
No. 165 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 10, 2015.
